text: Cini Boeri (June 19, 1924 â€“ September 9, 2020) was an Italian architect and designer. She was born in Milan. In the 1970s, Boeri began designing showrooms for Knoll in Europe and America. She worked for many other design companies, including lighting company Artemide, furniture company Arflex, and the housewares company Rosenthal. Boeri died at her home in Milan on September 9, 2020 at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian architects Category:Artists from Milan
title: Cini Boeri
